entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
